ComicInfo.Summary:
Sara's life at The Rose has started and so far has been nothing but idyllic and happy. But soon she'll realize behind the firm rules of the institution there are also shadows and secrets.
From the artist of the bestselling Faithless series... Acclaimed creator Maria Llovet (Faithless, Heartbeat, Loud) brings you a surreal, bewitching tale of love, magic, and tragedy in Eros/Psyche.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Adam Gorham | 1 | B | Cover B | Maria Llovet | 2 | C | Cover C | Kajo Baldisimo & Jorge Sutil | 3 | D | Homage Cover D (Pulp Fiction Movie Poster) | Sabine Rich | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover E (Virgin) | Adam Gorham | 5 | F | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Cover F (Virgin Black & White) | Kajo Baldisimo | 6 | G | 1:30 Retailer Incentive Cover G (Virgin) | Sabine Rich | 7 |
